name: Career Readiness: Character, DEI, and SEL_Sep.2023
description: The Career Readiness: Character, Diversity-Equity-Inclusion (DEI), and Social and Emotional Learning (SEL) skills collection is specifically designed to enhance workplace and career management success by curating the most sought-after skills by employers. The National Association of Colleges and Employers (NACE) Career Readiness Competencies were also referenced in the curation of this skill collection.
creator: https://credentialengineregistry.org/resources/ce-036d082d-d80e-41a7-99a0-2d63a4ad3a4a
